DOC.brief_summary: This drug-drug interaction study evaluate effect steady-state exposure E5555 main metabolite pharmacokinetics ( PK ) metformin , organic cation transporter-2 ( OCT2 ) substrate . In addition , study also investigate effect E5555 several renal function parameter .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized , Placebo-controlled Study Evaluate Effects E5555 Renal Function Parameters OCT2 Activity
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject age great equal 18 year 55 year History medical condition result increase risk bleed include limited active recurrent gastric ulcer , recent head trauma surgery , severe hypertension , bacterial endocarditis , etc . Creatinine clearance < 90 mL/min estimate use CockcroftGault formula screen baseline History renal disorder , proteinuria , hepatobiliary disease .
